Package template.xml

Interface XmlWritable

All Known Implementing Classes:
XmlExample.ObjectA, XmlExample.ObjectB
public interface XmlWritable
An interface an object may implement to make it writable to XML using XmlWriter.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    toXml(XmlWriter xmlwriter, boolean verbose)
    Write the contents of this object as XML (using the XmlDbWriter.

  • Method Details

    • toXml

      void toXml(XmlWriter xmlwriter, boolean verbose) throws IOException
      Write the contents of this object as XML (using the XmlDbWriter.
      Parameters:
      xmlwriter - the writer
      verbose - true if the XML writer should create verbose information in the XML file to make it more human readable, false otherwise. Implementation can use this flag
      Throws:
      IOException - signals that an I/O exception has occurred
